Имею опыт решения задач различных сложно: I have experience in solving problems of various complexities. For more information about my career, see
Позволяет мне быстро и легко адаптироват: Allows me to quickly and easily adapt to different development conditions using third-party ready-made solutions
Сопровождаю проект на всех этапах разраб: I accompany the project at all stages of development. From design and idea development to launching the project on the server
Анализируем запрос клиента. Ставим задач: We analyze the client's request. We set tasks, set deadlines. We select tools.
Создание веб приложений. Разработка прил: Creation of web applications. Development of the application in whole or in part. Creation of modules, components, API configuration, refinement of business logic, refactoring, application optimization.
Создание REST API сервисов. Авторизация,: Creation of REST API services. Authorization, authentication. Creation of controllers and models for interaction with the database. Writing endpoints.
Написание парсеров данных под определенн: Writing data parsers for specific sites
Написание автотесты для веб приложения: Writing automated tests for a web application
Написание unit текстов для веб приложени: Writing unit texts for a web application
Провожу рефакторинг кода, оптимизирую ра: I refactor the code, optimize the operation of the web application
Для использовании инструментов нужна уче: An account is required to use the tools.
Инструмент для отслеживания времени потр: Tool for tracking time spent on tasks
Инструмент для учета расходов и управлен: A tool for tracking expenses and managing personal capital
Вам будет предложена первичная консульта: You will be offered an initial consultation
Утверждаю план работы совместно с клиент: I approve the work plan together with the client
Я принимаю оплату за каждую выполненную: I accept payment for every completed task
В работе со мной вы получаете гарантийны: When working with me you get a guarantee period
У вас есть возможность изменить план раб: You have the opportunity to change your work plan
На консультации я внимательно разберу за: During the consultation, I will carefully analyze the request and offer options for solving the problem. The consultation will allow you to understand which tools are suitable for solving the technical issues raised, and what technological solutions are available for your project. By combining our ideas, we will choose the most effective strategy. Based on it, a task plan (technical specifications) is then drawn up.
Перед началом совместной работы вы получ: Before you start working together, you receive a delivery plan for the order. It contains the number of tasks required to be completed, the deadline for their completion and the cost. In the tasks, we determine what technology we will use, what program code is used, etc. This division of the order into subtasks will allow us to see the result and process from the very beginning to the final version.
Оплата за заказ происходит поэтапно. При: Payment for the order occurs in stages. Accepting the result for each task, the client makes a payment. This approach creates safe conditions for cooperation.
Критериями для гарантийных случаев являю: The criteria for warranty cases are the technical specifications specified in the plan. If at the order evaluation stage I incorrectly calculated the task completion time, additional time for the client is calculated under the guarantee. Correction under warranty is free of charge.
В техническое задание (план работы) могу: New tasks may be included in the terms of reference (work plan) for an additional fee. It happens that a new task affects tasks already completed, and they need to be improved. In this case, each new task is re-evaluated in terms of execution time and service cost. If the plan is changed, payment for work already completed and accepted will not be refunded.
Только зарегистрированным пользователям: Only registered users have access to my services
Пройдя авторизацию вы сможете использова: After authorization you will be able to use my tools
